T02D1564:224a-1: badzra yo gi n'i ga na tsakra bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D1564:224a-3: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1564:224a-4: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1564:224a-5: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa dang //
T02D1564:224a-6: rnal 'byor dam tshig gso ba dang //
T02D1564:224a-7: bde gshegs mkha' 'gro mchod bya'i phyir //
T02D1564:224a-8: dpa' bo'i ston mo tshogs 'khor bshad //
T02D1564:224a-9: de la ka p'a la'am snod shin tu mdzes pa
T02D1564:224a-10: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i nang du tshogs kyi yo
T02D1564:224a-11: byad bshams pa ni sha lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga
T02D1564:224a-12: dang dam tshig gi rdzas bdud rtsi ril bu dang
T02D1564:224a-13: gzhan yang zhal zas kyi khyad par rnam pa sna
T02D1564:224a-14: tshogs pa dang bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs
T02D1564:224a-15: pa'i longs spyod bya ba rnams bshams la ras dmar
T02D1564:224a-17: der dang por rnal 'byor pho mo thams cad khrus byas te /
T02D1564:224a-18: bdud rtsi lnga dang dri bzang pos lus byugs te /
T02D1564:224a-20: rus pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang mgo la me tog bzhag pa'am /
T02D1564:224a-21: phreng ba bcings te thig btab pa'i le'u tshe'am /
T02D1564:224a-22: pho mos spos pa rang rang gi gnas su 'dug ste /
T02D1564:224a-23: rje btsun ma'i rnal 'byor du bya ste /
T02D1564:224a-24: de la las kyi slob dpon gyis mchod pa rnam pa lnga rim pa ltar dbul lo //
T02D1564:224a-25: de nas tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis tshogs byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1564:224a-26: rdzas rnams kyi 'og tu ae las chos 'byung bsam /
T02D1564:224a-27: de'i steng du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu
T02D1564:224a-28: bkang pa lta bu ba dan gyis mtshan pa de'i
T02D1564:224a-29: steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar
T02D1564:224a-30: po // de nas aom a'a: h'um gsum las skyed
T02D1564:224a-31: pu mi mgo skam po gsum de'i steng du aa
T02D1564:224a-32: las thod pa skam po'i nang du de bzhin gshegs
T02D1564:224a-33: pa lnga'i rang bzhin sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga zla
T02D1564:224a-35: de'i steng du rdo rje lte ba la h'um /
T02D1564:224b-0: de la 'od zer spro @224b bsdu byas pas /
T02D1564:224b-1: rlung gis me sbar bas de rnams bzhu nas bdud
T02D1564:224b-2: rtsi'i rang bzhin gyis khams gsum dang dus gsum na
T02D1564:224b-3: bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs pa la
T02D1564:224b-4: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin du bsams la
T02D1564:224b-5: / de nas gtor ma chen pos mchod par bya ste /
T02D1564:224b-6: tshogs kyi phung bcad de de lag tu thogs nas 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D1564:224b-7: aom badzra b'a r'a hr'i panytsa ta th'a ga ta aargham p'u dza y'a mi /
T02D1564:224b-9: dh'u pam p'um dza y'a mi /
T02D1564:224b-10: d'i pam p'u dza y'a mi /
T02D1564:224b-12: nee bi dye p'u dza y'a mi /
T02D1564:224b-13: a'a darsha p'u dza y'a mi /
T02D1564:224b-15: zhes glur blangs la lha mo brgyad kyis mchod do //
T02D1564:224b-16: de nas las kyi slob dpon gyis phud rnams gtor
T02D1564:224b-17: mar bsams la gu ru aa dhishsh'a na ma h'a
T02D1564:224b-18: ba la badzra pra t'i tstsha ho:/
T02D1564:224b-19: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi bhu nydza ho:/
T02D1564:224b-25: aadhishshr'i na ma h'a ba lim pra t'i tstsha ho //
T02D1564:224b-26: zhes glur blang zhing lha'i ming sbyar la dbul lo //
T02D1564:224b-27: de nas las kyi slob dpon gyis tshogs kyi slob
T02D1564:224b-28: dpon la sogs pa kun gyi mdun du mandala bya
T02D1564:224b-29: ste / rdo rje lag skor dang bcas pas gar bya zhing /
T02D1564:224b-30: khyed ni rnal 'byor dam pa'i mchog / bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba'i //
T02D1564:224b-31: de yi rkyen du dbul lags kyis //
T02D1564:224b-32: dgyes pa'i mdangs kyis bzhes su gsol //
T02D1564:224b-33: de nas bza' ba dang btung pa la sogs pas
T02D1564:224b-34: tshim pa dang khyad par dang thun mong du byas
T02D1564:224b-35: la / rnal 'byor pho mo kun langs la //
T02D1564:224b-36: rdo rje'i gar dang glu blang bar bya //
T02D1564:224b-37: aom badzra d'a ki n'i p'u dza y'a mi /
T02D1564:224b-38: zhes mkha' 'gro ma lnga glur blang ngo //
T02D1564:224b-39: gzhan yang skad cig glur blang ba ni //
T02D1564:224b-42: rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig ma //
T02D1564:224b-43: dga' ba'i longs spyod rab tu 'bul //
T02D1564:224b-44: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'o //
T02D1564:224b-45: sgeg dang lta ba sogs pa //
T02D1564:224b-46: rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma //
T02D1564:224b-47: mchog dga'i longs spyod rab tu dbul //
T02D1564:224b-48: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'o //
T02D1564:224b-49: bde ba'i ston mo la sogs pa //
T02D1564:224b-50: rnam par smin ma'i skad cig ma //
T02D1564:224b-51: mchod dga'i longs spyod rab tu dbul //
T02D1564:224b-52: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'o //
T02D1564:224b-53: bde ba'i ston mo la sogs pa //
T02D1564:224b-54: rnam pa med dang mtshan nyid bral //
T02D1564:224b-55: dga' bral lhan skyes longs spyod dbul //
T02D1564:224b-56: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i //
T02D1564:225a-2: nam mkha' kun gyi rnal 'byor ba //
T02D1564:225a-3: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid la zhugs shing //
T02D1564:225a-4: thams cad mkha' ltar longs spyod pa'o //
T02D1564:225a-6: de nas lhag ma bsdus la mkha' 'gro ma'i gtor ma dang lhan cig tu bzhag la /
T02D1564:225a-7: aom badzra d'a ki n'i pa lim pra t'i tstsha ho //
T02D1564:225a-8: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi bhu nydza ho:/
T02D1564:225a-9: zhes lhag ma bsdus la gtang ngo //
T02D1564:225a-10: de nas chos skyong gi gtor ma rang gi cho ga ltar gtang ngo //
T02D1564:225a-11: gtor ma gsum gtong ba'i tshe //
T02D1564:225a-12: dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo dang /
T02D1564:225a-13: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas dang //
T02D1564:225a-14: zhes pa la sogs pa brjod do //
T02D1564:225a-15: de nas smon lam gdab ste //
T02D1564:225a-16: skye ba gang thob de dang der //
T02D1564:225a-17: don kun sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1564:225a-19: 'gro ba kun gyis thob par shog / byang chub rdo rje sngags pa dang //
T02D1564:225a-20: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems thob dang //
T02D1564:225a-21: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'am //
T02D1564:225a-22: bdag ni de nyid thob par shog / rigs su skye dang dam tshig can //
T02D1564:225a-23: zhes pa la sogs pa'i smon lam yang gdab bo //
T02D1564:225a-24: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a mandala mu:/
T02D1564:225a-25: zhes pa ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro gshegs su gso /
T02D1564:225a-26: dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro rnams rang la bsdu /
T02D1564:225a-27: rang mi dmigs par stong pa nyid du bsams te /
T02D1564:225a-28: skye ba med par rgyas gdab bo //
T02D1564:225a-29: de nas rje btsun ma'i nga rgyal gyis spyod lam la gnas par bya'o //
T02D1564:225a-30: rdo rje phag mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga
T02D1564:225a-31: zhes bya ba grub pa thob pa sha ba ri
T02D1564:225a-32: zhags kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1564:225a-34: // / yul ma ga dh'a'i pandi ta goo ta ma bha dra'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan te ;
T02D1564:225a-35: lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos //
